Description:
Detects the use of a Microsoft signed script 'REGISTER_APP.VBS' to register a VSS/VDS Provider as a COM+ application.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: REGISTER_APP.VBS Proxy Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%\register_app.vbs%' and command like '%-register%')
